title: Riot servers?
body: Today i started a game. I picked my champ and the game started. Oh, no, wait, its another story. So i only saw the black background and the game said i couldnt join to the game. I re-started client and then i was in the client again. I didnt lose any lp and its not in my Match history. HELP!

replies.body: This issue is EUNE specific.  We are aware of it and should have a fix within ~30 min.  If you try again then and still have this problem please let me know.  Sorry for the inconvenience ><
